1.text: Grab a standard deck, a few friends, and some scratch paper.

2.text: Pick up your cards, and pass three cards as follows:

3.text: Pick up the cards the opponent passed.

4.text: Play "tricks" by attempting to "follow the suit" of the card that led.

5.text: Avoid taking tricks by trying not to play the highest-ranking card during the trick.

6.text: Avoid Hearts and the Queen of Spades.

7.text: Calculate your score at the end of each hand.

8.text: Be aware of common rule variations.

9.text: Start the game by passing your highest cards.

10.text: Begin playing, following suit when you can.

11.text: If you lead a trick, try to play a card that is likely to be beaten.

12.text: If you don't lead a trick, follow suit with a card lower than the lead card.

14.text: Only try to shoot the moon when you have a reasonable chance of doing so.
